snippet: You might think that the increased availability of health insurance would make it easier for entrepreneurs to quit jobs and start businesses — but it’s not easy to prove.
abstract: You might think that the increased availability of health insurance would make it easier for entrepreneurs to quit jobs and start businesses — but it’s not easy to prove.

headline.main: Assessing the Impact of Health Care Reform on New Businesses In Massachusetts

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
